column1: Art Institute of Chicago////There are a few smalls problems. The first being the lay out. The museum has been expanded over the years
column2: and because of the location near the train tracks
column3: the building is super confusing and hard to navigate. I had to keep back tracking
column4: and going through exhibits I wasn't interested in to find the exhibits I did want to see. I just did not like the set up at all
column5: and found it to be super confusing
column6: and I wasted a lot of time just trying to figure out where to go
